   21: %%
   22: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Purpose:
   24: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: -module(megaco_tcp_SUITE).
   26: 
   27: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %% Include files
   29: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: -include_lib("megaco/src/tcp/megaco_tcp.hrl").
   31: -include("megaco_test_lib.hrl").
   32: 
   33: 
   34: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: %% External exports
   36: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: -export([
   38: 	 suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   39: 	 init_per_suite/1,    end_per_suite/1, 
   40:          init_per_group/2,    end_per_group/2,
   41: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2, 
   42: 
   43: 	 start_normal/1,
   44: 	 start_invalid_opt/1,
   45: 	 start_and_stop/1,
   46: 	 sendreceive/1, 
   47: 	 block_unblock/1, 
   48: 	 socket_failure/1,
   49: 	 accept_process/1,
   50: 	 accept_supervisor/1,
   51: 	 connection_supervisor/1,
   52: 	 tcp_server/1
   53: 
   54:         ]).
   55: 
   56: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   57: %% Internal exports
   58: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   59: 
   60: -export([
   61: 	 receive_message/4,
   62: 	 process_received_message/4
   63:         ]).
   64: 
   65: 
   66: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: %% Macros
   68: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: 
   70: -define(CH,             megaco_test_command_handler).
   71: -define(TEST_VERBOSITY, debug).
   72: 
   73: %% We have some strange reuseaddr issue (*some* times we eaddrinuse),
   74: %% so this is intended to "ensure" we get no conflict.
   75: -define(SERVER_PORT(C, I),
   76:         2944 + proplists:get_value(adjust_server_port, C) + (I-1)).
   77: 
   78: 
   79: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   80: %% Records
   81: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   82: 
   83: 
   84: %%======================================================================
   85: %% Common Test interface functions
   86: %%======================================================================
   87: 
   88: suite() -> 
   89:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   90: 
   91: all() -> 
   92:     %% This is a temporary messure to ensure that we can 
   93:     %% test the socket backend without effecting *all*
   94:     %% applications on *all* machines.
   95:     %% This flag is set only for *one* host.
   96:     case ?TEST_INET_BACKENDS() of
   97:         true ->
   98:             [
   99:              {group, inet_backend_default},
  100:              {group, inet_backend_inet},
  101:              {group, inet_backend_socket}
  102:             ];
  103:         _ ->
  104:             [
  105:              {group, inet_backend_default}
  106:             ]
  107:     end.
  108: 
  109: groups() -> 
  110:     [
  111:      {inet_backend_default,          [], inet_backend_default_cases()},
  112:      {inet_backend_inet,             [], inet_backend_inet_cases()},
  113:      {inet_backend_socket,           [], inet_backend_socket_cases()},
  114: 
  115:      {all,                           [], all_cases()},
  116:      {start,                         [], start_cases()},
  117:      {sending,                       [], sending_cases()},
  118:      {error,                         [], error_cases()}
  119:     ].
  120: 
  121: inet_backend_default_cases() ->
  122:     [{all, [], all_cases()}].
  123: 
  124: inet_backend_inet_cases() ->
  125:     [{all, [], all_cases()}].
  126: 
  127: inet_backend_socket_cases() ->
  128:     [{all, [], all_cases()}].
  129: 
  130: all_cases() -> 
  131:     [
  132:      {group, start},
  133:      {group, sending},
  134:      {group, error}
  135:     ].
  136: 
  137: 
  138: start_cases() ->
  139:     [
  140:      start_normal,
  141:      start_invalid_opt,
  142:      start_and_stop
  143:     ].
  144: 
  145: sending_cases() ->
  146:     [
  147:      sendreceive,
  148:      block_unblock
  149:     ].
  150: 
  151: error_cases() ->
  152:     [
  153:      socket_failure,
  154:      accept_process,
  155:      accept_supervisor,
  156:      connection_supervisor,
  157:      tcp_server
  158:     ].
  159: 
  160: 
  161: %%
  162: %% -----
  163: %%
  164: 
  165: init_per_suite(suite) ->
  166:     [];
  167: init_per_suite(doc) ->
  168:     [];
  169: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  170: 
  171:     ?ANNOUNCE_SUITE_INIT(),
  172: 
  173:     p("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  174:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  175:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  176: 
  177:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  178:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  179:             SKIP;
  180: 
  181:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  182: 
  183:             %% We need a (local) monitor on this node also
  184:             megaco_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  185: 
  186:             p("init_per_suite -> end when"
  187:               "~n      Config: ~p"
  188:               "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config1, erlang:nodes()]),
  189: 
  190:             Config1
  191:     end.
  192: 
  193: end_per_suite(suite) -> [];
  194: end_per_suite(doc) -> [];
  195: end_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  196: 
  197:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  198:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  199:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  200: 
  201:     megaco_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  202:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  203: 
  204:     p("end_per_suite -> end when"
  205:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  206: 
  207:     Config1.
  208: 
  209: 
  210: %%
  211: %% -----
  212: %%
  213: 
  214: init_per_group(inet_backend_default = Group, Config) ->
  215:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  216:     [{adjust_server_port, 0},
  217:      {socket_create_opts, []} | Config];
  218: init_per_group(inet_backend_inet = Group, Config) ->
  219:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  220:     case ?EXPLICIT_INET_BACKEND() of
  221:         true ->
  222:             %% The environment trumps us,
  223:             %% so only the default group should be run!
  224:             {skip, "explicit inet backend"};
  225:         false ->
  226:             [{adjust_server_port, 100},
  227:              {socket_create_opts, [{inet_backend, inet}]} | Config]
  228:     end;
  229: init_per_group(inet_backend_socket = Group, Config) ->
  230:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  231:     case ?EXPLICIT_INET_BACKEND() of
  232:         true ->
  233:             %% The environment trumps us,
  234:             %% so only the default group should be run!
  235:             {skip, "explicit inet backend"};
  236:         false ->
  237:             [{adjust_server_port, 200},
  238:              {socket_create_opts, [{inet_backend, socket}]} | Config]
  239:     end;
  240: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  241:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  242:     Config.
  243: 
  244: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) when (inet_backend_default =:= GroupName) orelse
  245:                                       (inet_backend_init    =:= GroupName) orelse
  246:                                       (inet_backend_socket  =:= GroupName) ->
  247:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(5)),
  248:     Config;
  249: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  250:     Config.
  251: 
  252: 
  253: %%
  254: %% -----
  255: %%
  256: 
  257: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  258: 
  259:     p("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  260:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  261:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  262:     
  263:     megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  264: 
  265:     megaco_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  266: 
  267: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  268: 
  269:     p("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  270:       "~n   Config:  ~p"
  271:       "~n   Nodes:   ~p",
  272:       [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  273: 
  274:     p("system events during test: "
  275:       "~n   ~p", [megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  276: 
  277:     megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  278: 
  279: 
  280: 
  281: 
  282: %% ------------------ start ------------------------
  283: 
  284: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  285: 
  286: start_normal(suite) ->
  287:     [];
  288: start_normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  289:     put(sname, "start_normal"),
  290:     p("BEGIN TEST-CASE"), 
  291:     Options = [{port, 20000}, {receive_handle, apa}],
  292:     {ok, Pid} = start_case(Config, Options, ok),
  293:     megaco_tcp:stop_transport(Pid),
  294:     p("done"),
  295:     ok.
  296: 
  297: 
  298: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  299: 
  300: start_invalid_opt(suite) ->
  301:     [];
  302: start_invalid_opt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  303:     put(sname, "start_invalid_opt"),
  304:     p("BEGIN TEST-CASE"), 
  305:     Options = [{port, 20000}, {receivehandle, apa}],
  306:     ok = start_case(Config, Options, error),
  307:     p("done"),
  308:     ok.
  309: 
  310: 
  311: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  312: 
  313: start_and_stop(suite) ->
  314:     [];
  315: start_and_stop(doc) ->
  316:     ["This test case sets up a connection and then cloises it. "
  317:      "No data is sent. "];
  318: start_and_stop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  319:     Pre = fun() ->
  320: 		  p("create nodes"),
  321: 		  ServerNode = make_node_name(t_sas_server),
  322: 		  ClientNode = make_node_name(t_sas_client),
  323: 		  Nodes = [ServerNode, ClientNode], 
  324: 		  ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  325: 		  Nodes
  326: 	  end,
  327:     Case = fun(X) -> do_start_and_stop(Config, X) end,
  328:     %% Case = fun(X) -> do_start_and_stop(Config, X, 10) end,
  329:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
  330:                    p("stop nodes"),
  331:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
  332:            end,
  333:     try_tc(start_and_stop, Pre, Case, Post).
  334: 
  335: 
  336: %% do_start_and_stop(_Config, _Nodes, 0) ->
  337: %%     ok;
  338: %% do_start_and_stop(Config, Nodes, N) ->
  339: %%     do_start_and_stop(Config, Nodes),
  340: %%     do_start_and_stop(Config, Nodes, N-1).
  341: 
  342: do_start_and_stop(Config, [ServerNode, ClientNode]) ->
  343:     %% Create command sequences
  344:     p("create command sequences"),
  345:     ServerPort = ?SERVER_PORT(Config, 1),  % 2944,
  346:     ServerCmds = start_and_stop_server_commands(Config, ServerPort),
  347:     {ok, ServerHost} = inet:gethostname(),
  348:     ClientCmds = start_and_stop_client_commands(Config, ServerPort, ServerHost),
  349: 
  350:     %% Start the test procs used in the test-case, one for each node
  351:     p("start command handlers"),
  352:     Server = server_start_command_handler(ServerNode, ServerCmds),
  353:     p("server command handler started: ~p", [Server]),
  354:     Client = client_start_command_handler(ClientNode, ClientCmds),
  355:     p("client command handler started: ~p", [Client]),
  356: 
  357:     await_server_listening(Server, Client),
  358: 
  359:     ok = await_command_handler_completion([Server, Client], ?SECS(20)),
  360:     p("done"),
  361:     ok.
  362: 
  363: 
  364: start_and_stop_server_commands(Config, Port) ->
  365:     Opts = [{port, Port}], 
  366:     Self = self(),
  367:     [
  368:      #{id   => 1,
  369:        desc => "Command sequence init",
  370:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  371: 		      {ok, State#{parent => Self}} 
  372: 	      end},
  373: 
  374:      #{id   => 2,
  375:        desc => "Start transport",
  376:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  377: 		      server_start_transport(State) 
  378: 	      end},
  379: 
  380:      #{id   => 3,
  381:        desc => "Listen",
  382:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  383:                        server_listen(Config, State, Opts) 
  384: 	      end},
  385: 
  386:      #{id   => 4,
  387:        desc => "Notify listening",
  388:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  389: 		      server_notify_listening(State) 
  390: 	      end},
  391: 
  392:      #{id   => 5,
  393:        desc => "Await nothing",
  394:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  395: 		      server_await_nothing(State, 6000) 
  396: 	      end},
  397: 
  398:      #{id   => 6,
  399:        desc => "Stop",
  400:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  401: 		      server_stop_transport(State) 
  402: 	      end}
  403: 
  404:     ].
  405: 
  406: 
  407: start_and_stop_client_commands(Config, ServerPort, ServerHost) ->
  408:     Opts = [{port, ServerPort}, {host, ServerHost}], 
  409:     Self = self(),
  410:     [
  411:      #{id   => 1,
  412:        desc => "Command sequence init",
  413:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  414: 		      {ok, State#{parent => Self}} 
  415: 	      end},
  416: 
  417:      #{id   => 2,
  418:        desc => "Start transport",
  419:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  420: 		      client_start_transport(State) 
  421: 	      end},
  422: 
  423:      #{id   => 3,
  424:        desc => "Await continue",
  425:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  426: 		      client_await_continue_signal(State, 5000) 
  427: 	      end},
  428: 
  429:      #{id   => 4,
  430:        desc => "Connect",
  431:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  432: 		      client_connect(Config, State, Opts) 
  433: 	      end},
  434: 
  435:      #{id   => 5,
  436:        desc => "Await nothing",
  437:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  438: 		      client_await_nothing(State, 5000) 
  439: 	      end},
  440: 
  441:      #{id   => 6,
  442:        desc => "Disconnect",
  443:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  444: 		      client_disconnect(State) 
  445: 	      end},
  446: 
  447:      #{id   => 7,
  448:        desc => "Stop transport",
  449:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  450: 		      client_stop_transport(State) 
  451: 	      end}
  452:     ].
  453: 
  454: 
  455: %% ------------------ sending ------------------------
  456: 
  457: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  458: 
  459: sendreceive(suite) ->
  460:     [];
  461: sendreceive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  462:     Pre = fun() ->
  463: 		  p("create nodes"),
  464: 		  ServerNode = make_node_name(t_sr_server),
  465: 		  ClientNode = make_node_name(t_sr_client),
  466: 		  Nodes = [ServerNode, ClientNode], 
  467: 		  ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  468: 		  Nodes
  469: 	  end,
  470:     Case = fun(X) -> do_sendreceive(Config, X) end,
  471:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
  472:                    p("stop nodes"),
  473:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
  474:            end,
  475:     try_tc(sendreceive, Pre, Case, Post).
  476: 
  477: do_sendreceive(Config, [ServerNode, ClientNode]) ->
  478:     p("retrieve server info (host and port)"),
  479:     ServerPort       = ?SERVER_PORT(Config, 2), % 2944,
  480:     {ok, ServerHost} = inet:gethostname(),
  481: 
  482:     %% Create command sequences
  483:     p("create server command sequence: "
  484:       "~n      Server Port: ~p"
  485:       "~n      Server Host: ~p", [ServerPort, ServerHost]),
  486:     ServerCmds = sendreceive_server_commands(Config, ServerPort, ServerHost),
  487:     p("create client command sequence: "
  488:       "~n      Server Port: ~p"
  489:       "~n      Server Host: ~p", [ServerPort, ServerHost]),
  490:     ClientCmds = sendreceive_client_commands(Config, ServerPort, ServerHost),
  491: 
  492:     %% Start the test procs used in the test-case, one for each node
  493:     p("start command handler(s)"),
  494:     Server = server_start_command_handler(ServerNode, ServerCmds),
  495:     p("server command handler started: ~p", [Server]),
  496:     Client = client_start_command_handler(ClientNode, ClientCmds),
  497:     p("client command handler started: ~p", [Client]),
  498: 
  499:     await_server_listening(Server, Client),
  500:     
  501:     ok = await_command_handler_completion([Server, Client], ?SECS(20)),
  502:     p("done"),
  503:     ok.
  504: 
  505: 
  506: sendreceive_server_commands(Config, Port, Host) ->
  507:     Opts = [{host, Host}, {port, Port}], 
  508:     Self = self(),
  509:     [
  510:      #{id   => 1,
  511:        desc => "Command sequence init",
  512:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  513: 		       {ok, State#{parent => Self}} 
  514: 	       end},
  515: 
  516:      #{id   => 2,
  517:        desc => "Start transport",
  518:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  519: 		       server_start_transport(State) 
  520: 	       end},
  521: 
  522:      #{id   => 3,
  523:        desc => "Listen",
  524:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  525: 		       server_listen(Config, State, Opts) 
  526: 	       end},
  527: 
  528:      #{id   => 4,
  529:        desc => "Notify listening",
  530:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  531: 		       server_notify_listening(State) 
  532: 	       end},
  533: 
  534:      #{id   => 5,
  535:        desc => "Await initial message (ping)",
  536:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  537: 		       server_await_initial_message(State, "ping", 5000) 
  538: 	       end},
  539: 
  540:      #{id   => 6,
  541:        desc => "Send reply (pong) to initial message",
  542:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  543: 		       server_send_message(State, "pong") 
  544: 	       end},
  545: 
  546:      #{id   => 7,
  547:        desc => "Await nothing before sending a message (hejsan)",
  548:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  549: 		       server_await_nothing(State, 1000) 
  550: 	       end},
  551: 
  552:      #{id   => 8,
  553:        desc => "Send message (hejsan)",
  554:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  555: 		       server_send_message(State, "hejsan") 
  556: 	       end},
  557: 
  558:      #{id   => 9,
  559:        desc => "Await reply (hoppsan) to message",
  560:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  561: 		       server_await_message(State, "hoppsan", 1000) 
  562: 	       end},
  563: 
  564:      #{id   => 10,
  565:        desc => "Await nothing before disconnecting",
  566:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  567: 		       server_await_nothing(State, 1000) 
  568: 	       end},
  569: 
  570:      #{id   => 11,
  571:        desc => "Disconnect",
  572:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  573: 		       server_disconnect(State) 
  574: 	       end},
  575: 
  576:      #{id   => 12,
  577:        desc => "Await nothing before stopping transport",
  578:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  579: 		       server_await_nothing(State, 1000) 
  580: 	       end},
  581: 
  582:      #{id   => 13,
  583:        desc => "Stop",
  584:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  585: 		       server_stop_transport(State) 
  586: 	       end}
  587: 
  588:     ].
  589: 
  590: sendreceive_client_commands(Config, ServerPort, ServerHost) ->
  591:     Opts = [{port, ServerPort}, {host, ServerHost}], 
  592:     Self = self(),
  593:     [
  594:      #{id   => 1,
  595:        desc => "Command sequence init",
  596:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  597: 		       {ok, State#{parent => Self}} 
  598: 	       end},
  599: 
  600:      #{id   => 2,
  601:        desc => "Start transport",
  602:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  603: 		       client_start_transport(State) 
  604: 	       end},
  605: 
  606:      #{id   => 3,
  607:        desc => "Await continue",
  608:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  609: 		       client_await_continue_signal(State, 5000) 
  610: 	       end},
  611: 
  612:      #{id   => 4,
  613:        desc => "Connect",
  614:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  615: 		       client_connect(Config, State, Opts) 
  616: 	       end},
  617: 
  618:      #{id   => 5,
  619:        desc => "Send initial message (ping)",
  620:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  621: 		       client_send_message(State, "ping") 
  622: 	       end},
  623: 
  624:      #{id   => 6,
  625:        desc => "Await reply (pong) to initial message",
  626:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  627: 		       client_await_message(State, "pong", 1000) 
  628: 	       end},
  629: 
  630:      #{id   => 7,
  631:        desc => "Await message (hejsan)",
  632:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  633: 		       client_await_message(State, "hejsan", 5000) 
  634: 	       end},
  635: 
  636:      #{id   => 8,
  637:        desc => "Send reply (hoppsan) to message",
  638:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  639: 		       client_send_message(State, "hoppsan") 
  640: 	       end},
  641: 
  642:      #{id   => 9,
  643:        desc => "Await nothing before disconnecting",
  644:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  645: 		       client_await_nothing(State, 1000) 
  646: 	       end},
  647: 
  648:      #{id   => 10,
  649:        desc => "Disconnect",
  650:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  651: 		       client_disconnect(State) 
  652: 	       end},
  653: 
  654:      #{id   => 11,
  655:        desc => "Await nothing before stopping transport",
  656:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  657: 		       client_await_nothing(State, 1000) 
  658: 	       end},
  659: 
  660:      #{id   => 12,
  661:        desc => "Stop transport",
  662:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  663: 		       client_stop_transport(State) 
  664: 	       end}
  665:     ].
  666: 
  667: 
  668: 
  669: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  670: 
  671: block_unblock(suite) ->
  672:     [];
  673: block_unblock(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  674:     Pre = fun() ->
  675: 		  p("create nodes"),
  676: 		  ServerNode = make_node_name(t_bb_server),
  677: 		  ClientNode = make_node_name(t_bb_client),
  678: 		  Nodes = [ServerNode, ClientNode], 
  679: 		  ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes, true),
  680: 		  Nodes
  681: 	  end,
  682:     Case = fun(X) -> do_block_unblock(Config, X) end,
  683:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
  684:                    p("stop nodes"),
  685:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
  686:            end,
  687:     try_tc(block_unblock, Pre, Case, Post).
  688: 
  689: do_block_unblock(Config, [ServerNode, ClientNode]) ->
  690:     %% Create command sequences
  691:     p("create command sequences"),
  692:     ServerPort = ?SERVER_PORT(Config, 3), % 2944, 
  693:     ServerCmds = block_unblock_server_commands(Config, ServerPort),
  694:     {ok, ServerHost} = inet:gethostname(),
  695:     ClientCmds = block_unblock_client_commands(Config, ServerPort, ServerHost),
  696: 
  697:     %% Start the test procs used in the test-case, one for each node
  698:     p("start command handlers"),
  699:     Server = server_start_command_handler(ServerNode, ServerCmds),
  700:     p("server command handler started: ~p", [Server]),
  701:     Client = client_start_command_handler(ClientNode, ClientCmds),
  702:     p("client command handler started: ~p", [Client]),
  703: 
  704:     await_server_listening(Server, Client),
  705: 
  706:     await_client_blocked(Server, Client),
  707: 
  708:     ok = await_command_handler_completion([Server, Client], ?SECS(30)),
  709:     p("done"),
  710:     ok.
  711: 
  712: 
  713: block_unblock_server_commands(Config, Port) ->
  714:     Opts = [{port, Port}],
  715:     Self = self(),
  716:     [
  717:      #{id   => 1,
  718:        desc => "Command sequence init",
  719:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  720: 		       {ok, State#{parent => Self}} 
  721: 	       end},
  722: 
  723:      #{id   => 2,
  724:        desc => "Start transport",
  725:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  726: 		       server_start_transport(State) 
  727: 	       end},
  728: 
  729:      #{id   => 3,
  730:        desc => "Listen",
  731:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  732: 		       server_listen(Config, State, Opts) 
  733: 	       end},
  734: 
  735:      #{id   => 4,
  736:        desc => "Notify listening",
  737:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  738: 		       server_notify_listening(State) 
  739: 	       end},
  740: 
  741:      #{id   => 5,
  742:        desc => "Await initial message (ping)",
  743:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  744: 		       server_await_initial_message(State, "ping", 5000) 
  745: 	       end},
  746: 
  747:      #{id   => 6,
  748:        desc => "Send reply (pong) to initial message",
  749:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  750: 		       server_send_message(State, "pong") 
  751: 	       end},
  752: 
  753:      #{id   => 7,
  754:        desc => "Await continue",
  755:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  756: 		       server_await_continue_signal(State, 5000) 
  757: 	       end},
  758: 
  759:      %% #{id   => 9,
  760:      %%   desc => "Await nothing before sending a message (hejsan)",
  761:      %%   cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  762:      %%    	       server_await_nothing(State, 1000) 
  763:      %%           end},
  764: 
  765:      #{id   => 10,
  766:        desc => "Send message (hejsan)",
  767:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  768: 		       server_send_message(State, "hejsan") 
  769: 	       end},
  770: 
  771:      #{id   => 11,
  772:        desc => "Await reply (hoppsan) to message",
  773:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  774: 		       server_await_message(State, "hoppsan", 10000) 
  775: 	       end},
  776: 
  777:      #{id   => 12,
  778:        desc => "Await nothing before disconnecting",
  779:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  780: 		       server_await_nothing(State, 1000) 
  781: 	       end},
  782: 
  783:      #{id   => 13,
  784:        desc => "Disconnect",
  785:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  786: 		       server_disconnect(State) 
  787: 	       end},
  788: 
  789:      #{id   => 14,
  790:        desc => "Await nothing before stopping transport",
  791:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  792: 		       server_await_nothing(State, 1000) 
  793: 	       end},
  794: 
  795:      #{id   => 15,
  796:        desc => "Stop",
  797:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  798: 		       server_stop_transport(State) 
  799: 	       end}
  800: 
  801:     ].
  802: 
  803: block_unblock_client_commands(Config, ServerPort, ServerHost) ->
  804:     Opts = [{port, ServerPort}, {host, ServerHost}], 
  805:     Self = self(),
  806:     [
  807:      #{id   => 1,
  808:        desc => "Command sequence init",
  809:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  810: 		       {ok, State#{parent => Self}} 
  811: 	       end},
  812: 
  813:      #{id   => 2,
  814:        desc => "Start transport",
  815:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  816: 		       client_start_transport(State) 
  817: 	       end},
  818: 
  819:      #{id   => 3,
  820:        desc => "Await continue",
  821:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  822: 		       client_await_continue_signal(State, 5000) 
  823: 	       end},
  824: 
  825:      #{id   => 4,
  826:        desc => "Connect",
  827:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  828: 		       client_connect(Config, State, Opts) 
  829: 	       end},
  830: 
  831:      #{id   => 5,
  832:        desc => "Send initial message (ping)",
  833:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  834: 		       client_send_message(State, "ping") 
  835: 	       end},
  836: 
  837:      #{id   => 6,
  838:        desc => "Await reply (pong) to initial message",
  839:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  840: 		       client_await_message(State, "pong", 1000) 
  841: 	       end},
  842: 
  843:      #{id   => 7,
  844:        desc => "Await nothing before blocking",
  845:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  846: 		       client_await_nothing(State, 1000) 
  847: 	       end},
  848: 
  849:      #{id   => 8,
  850:        desc => "Block",
  851:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  852: 		       client_block(State) 
  853: 	       end},
  854: 
  855:      #{id   => 9,
  856:        desc => "Notify blocked",
  857:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  858: 		       client_notify_blocked(State) 
  859: 	       end},
  860: 
  861:      #{id   => 10,
  862:        desc => "Await nothing before unblocking",
  863:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  864: 		       client_await_nothing(State, 5000) 
  865: 	       end},
  866: 
  867:      #{id   => 11,
  868:        desc => "Unblock",
  869:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  870: 		       client_unblock(State) 
  871: 	       end},
  872: 
  873:      #{id   => 12,
  874:        desc => "Await message (hejsan)",
  875:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  876: 		       client_await_message(State, "hejsan", 500) 
  877: 	       end},
  878: 
  879:      #{id   => 13,
  880:        desc => "Send reply (hoppsan) to message",
  881:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  882: 		       client_send_message(State, "hoppsan") 
  883: 	       end},
  884: 
  885:      #{id   => 14,
  886:        desc => "Await nothing before disconnecting",
  887:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  888: 		       client_await_nothing(State, 1000) 
  889: 	       end},
  890: 
  891:      #{id   => 15,
  892:        desc => "Disconnect",
  893:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  894: 		       client_disconnect(State) 
  895: 	       end},
  896: 
  897:      #{id   => 16,
  898:        desc => "Await nothing before stopping transport",
  899:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  900: 		       client_await_nothing(State, 1000) 
  901: 	       end},
  902: 
  903:      #{id   => 17,
  904:        desc => "Stop transport",
  905:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  906: 		       client_stop_transport(State) 
  907: 	       end}
  908:     ].
  909: 
  910:

  978: 
  979: %%======================================================================
  980: %% Test functions
  981: %%======================================================================
  982: 
  983: start_case(Config, Options, Expect) ->
  984:     p("start transport"),
  985:     case (catch megaco_tcp:start_transport()) of
  986: 	{ok, Pid} ->
  987: 	    p("create listen socket"),
  988: 	    case (catch ?LISTEN(Config, Pid, Options)) of
  989: 		ok when Expect =:= ok ->
  990: 		    p("extected listen result [ok]"),
  991: 		    {ok, Pid};
  992: 		ok ->
  993: 		    p("unexpected listen result [ok] - stop transport"),
  994: 		    megaco_tcp:stop_transport(Pid),
  995: 		    ?ERROR(unexpected_start_sucesss);
  996: 		{error, Reason} when Expect =:= error ->
  997: 		    p("expected listen result [error] - stop transport: "
  998:                       "~n      Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
  999: 		    megaco_tcp:stop_transport(Pid),
 1000: 		    ok;
 1001: 		{error, Reason} ->
 1002: 		    p("unexpected listen result [error] - stop transport: "
 1003:                       "~n      Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 1004: 		    megaco_tcp:stop_transport(Pid),
 1005: 		    ?ERROR({unexpected_start_failure, Reason});
 1006: 		Error ->
 1007: 		    p("unexpected listen result: "
 1008:                       "~n      Error: ~p", [Error]),
 1009: 		    megaco_tcp:stop_transport(Pid),
 1010: 		    ?ERROR({unexpected_result, Error})
 1011: 	    end;
 1012: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1013: 	    p("unexpected start_transport result"),
 1014: 	    ?ERROR({failed_starting_transport, Reason})
 1015:     end.
 1016: 
 1017: socket_faulure() ->
 1018:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
 1019: 
 1020: failing_accept_process() ->
 1021:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
 1022: 
 1023: failing_accept_supervisor() ->
 1024:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
 1025: 
 1026: failing_connection_supervisor() ->
 1027:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
 1028: 
 1029: failing_tcp_server() ->
 1030:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
 1031: 
 1032: 
 1033: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1034: %% Message Callback functions 
 1035: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1036: 
 1037: receive_message(ReceiveHandle, ControlPid, SendHandle, BinMsg) 
 1038:   when is_pid(ReceiveHandle) andalso is_binary(BinMsg) ->
 1039:     Msg = binary_to_list(BinMsg), 
 1040:     ReceiveHandle ! {receive_message, {ControlPid, SendHandle, Msg}},
 1041:     ok.
 1042:     
 1043: process_received_message(ReceiveHandle, ControlPid, SendHandle, BinMsg) 
 1044:   when is_pid(ReceiveHandle) andalso is_binary(BinMsg) ->
 1045:     Msg = binary_to_list(BinMsg), 
 1046:     ReceiveHandle ! {process_received_message, {ControlPid, SendHandle, Msg}},
 1047:     ok.
 1048: 
 1049: 
 1050: %%======================================================================
 1051: %% Internal functions
 1052: %%======================================================================
 1053: 
 1054: await_server_listening(Server, Client) ->
 1055:     receive
 1056:         {listening, Server} ->
 1057:             p("[await-server-listening] "
 1058:               "received listening message from server [~p] => "
 1059:               "send continue to client [~p]"
 1060:               "~n", [Server, Client]),
 1061:             Client ! {continue, self()},
 1062:             ok;
 1063: 	{'EXIT', Server, SReason} ->
 1064:             p("[await-server-listening] unexpected server (~p) exit: "
 1065:               "~n       ~p"
 1066:               "~n", [Server, SReason]),
 1067: 	    exit({server_crash, SReason});
 1068: 	{'EXIT', Client, CReason} ->
 1069:             p("[await-server-listening] "
 1070:               "unexpected client (~p) exit: "
 1071:               "~n       ~p"
 1072:               "~n", [Client, CReason]),
 1073: 	    exit({client_crash, CReason})
 1074:     after 5000 ->
 1075:             %% There is no normal reason why this should take any time.
 1076:             %% Normally, this takes a few milli seconds. So, if we are not
 1077:             %% up and running after 5 seconds, we give up and skip!!
 1078:             exit(Server, kill),
 1079:             exit(Client, kill),
 1080:             ?SKIP("Server timeout (listen)")
 1081:     end.
 1082: 
 1083: 
 1084: await_client_blocked(Server, Client) ->
 1085:     receive
 1086:         {blocked, Client} ->
 1087:             p("[await-client-blocked] "
 1088:               "received blocked message from client [~p] => "
 1089:               "send continue to server [~p]~n", [Client, Server]),
 1090:             Server ! {continue, self()},
 1091:             ok;
 1092: 	{'EXIT', Client, CReason} ->
 1093:             p("[await-client-blocked] "
 1094:               "unexpected client (~p) exit: "
 1095:               "~n       ~p"
 1096:               "~n", [Client, CReason]),
 1097: 	    exit({client_crash, CReason});
 1098: 	{'EXIT', Server, SReason} ->
 1099:             p("[await-client-blocked] "
 1100:               "unexpected server (~p) exit: "
 1101:               "~n       ~p"
 1102:               "~n", [Server, SReason]),
 1103: 	    exit({server_crash, SReason})
 1104:     after 5000 ->
 1105:             %% There is no normal reason why this should take any time.
 1106:             %% Normally, this takes a few milli seconds. So, if we are not
 1107:             %% up and running after 5 seconds, we give up and skip!!
 1108:             exit(Client, kill),
 1109:             exit(Server, kill),
 1110:             ?SKIP("Client timeout (blocked)")
 1111:     end.
 1112: 
 1113:     
 1114: 
 1115: %% -------  Server command handler and utility functions ----------
 1116: 
 1117: server_start_command_handler(Node, Commands) ->
 1118:     start_command_handler(Node, Commands, #{}, "server").
 1119: 
 1120: server_start_transport(State) when is_map(State) ->
 1121:     case (catch megaco_tcp:start_transport()) of
 1122: 	{ok, Ref} ->
 1123: 	    {ok, State#{transport_ref => Ref}};
 1124: 	Error ->
 1125: 	    Error
 1126:     end.
 1127: 
 1128: server_listen(Config, #{transport_ref := Ref} = State, Options) 
 1129:   when is_list(Options) ->
 1130:     ?SLEEP(1000),
 1131:     Opts = [{receive_handle, self()}, {module, ?MODULE} | Options], 
 1132:     case (catch ?LISTEN(Config, Ref, Opts)) of
 1133: 	ok ->
 1134: 	    {ok, State};
 1135: 	Error ->
 1136: 	    Error
 1137:     end.
 1138: 
 1139: server_notify_listening(#{parent := Parent} = State) ->
 1140:     Parent ! {listening, self()},
 1141:     {ok, State}.
 1142: 
 1143: server_await_continue_signal(#{parent := Parent} = State, Timeout) ->
 1144:     receive
 1145: 	{continue, Parent} ->
 1146: 	    {ok, State}
 1147:     after Timeout ->
 1148: 	    {error, timeout}
 1149:     end.
 1150:     
 1151: server_await_initial_message(State, InitialMessage, Timeout) 
 1152:   when is_map(State) ->
 1153:     receive 
 1154: 	{receive_message, {ControlPid, Handle, InitialMessage}} ->
 1155: 	    NewState = State#{control_pid => ControlPid,
 1156: 			      handle      => Handle},
 1157: 	    {ok, NewState};
 1158: 
 1159: 	Any ->
 1160: 	    p("received unexpected event: ~p", [Any]),
 1161: 	    {error, {unexpected_event, Any}}
 1162: 
 1163:     after Timeout ->
 1164: 	    {error, timeout}
 1165:     end.
 1166: 
 1167: server_send_message(#{handle := Handle} = State, Message) ->
 1168:     megaco_tcp:send_message(Handle, Message),
 1169:     {ok, State}.
 1170: 
 1171: server_await_nothing(State, Timeout) 
 1172:   when is_map(State) ->
 1173:     receive 
 1174: 	Any ->
 1175: 	    p("received unexpected event: ~p", [Any]),
 1176: 	    {error, {unexpected_event, Any}}
 1177: 
 1178:     after Timeout ->
 1179: 	    {ok, State}
 1180:     end.
 1181: 
 1182: server_await_message(State, ExpectMessage, Timeout) 
 1183:   when is_map(State) ->
 1184:     receive
 1185: 	{receive_message, {_, _, ExpectMessage}} ->
 1186: 	    {ok, State};
 1187: 
 1188: 	Any ->
 1189: 	    p("received unexpected event: ~p", [Any]),
 1190: 	    {error, {unexpected_event, Any}}
 1191: 
 1192:     after Timeout ->
 1193: 	    {error, timeout}
 1194:     end.
 1195: 
 1196: server_disconnect(#{handle := Handle} = State) 
 1197:   when (Handle =/= undefined) ->
 1198:      megaco_tcp:close(Handle),
 1199:     {ok, State#{handle => undefined}}.
 1200: 
 1201: server_stop_transport(#{transport_ref := Ref} = State) 
 1202:   when (Ref =/= undefined) ->
 1203:     megaco_tcp:stop_transport(Ref),
 1204:     {ok, State}.
 1205: 
 1206: 
 1207: %% -------  Client command handler and utility functions ----------
 1208: 
 1209: client_start_command_handler(Node, Commands) ->
 1210:     start_command_handler(Node, Commands, #{}, "client").
 1211: 		  
 1212: client_start_transport(State) when is_map(State) ->
 1213:     case (catch megaco_tcp:start_transport()) of
 1214: 	{ok, Ref} ->
 1215: 	    {ok, State#{transport_ref => Ref}};
 1216: 	Error ->
 1217: 	    Error
 1218:     end.
 1219: 
 1220: client_connect(Config, #{transport_ref := Ref} = State, Options) 
 1221:   when is_list(Options) ->
 1222:     Opts = [{receive_handle, self()}, {module, ?MODULE} | Options], 
 1223:     case (catch ?CONNECT(Config, Ref, Opts)) of
 1224: 	{ok, Handle, ControlPid} ->
 1225: 	    {ok, State#{control_pid => ControlPid, 
 1226: 			handle      => Handle}};
 1227: 	Error ->
 1228: 	    Error
 1229:     end.
 1230: 
 1231: client_await_continue_signal(#{parent := Parent} = State, Timeout) ->
 1232:     receive
 1233: 	{continue, Parent} ->
 1234: 	    {ok, State}
 1235:     after Timeout ->
 1236: 	    {error, timeout}
 1237:     end.
 1238:     
 1239: client_notify_blocked(#{parent := Parent} = State) ->
 1240:     Parent ! {blocked, self()},
 1241:     {ok, State}.
 1242: 
 1243: client_await_nothing(State, Timeout) 
 1244:   when is_map(State) ->
 1245:     receive 
 1246: 	Any ->
 1247: 	    p("received unexpected event: ~p", [Any]),
 1248: 	    {error, {unexpected_event, Any}}
 1249:     after Timeout ->
 1250: 	    {ok, State}
 1251:     end.
 1252: 
 1253: client_send_message(#{handle := Handle} = State, Message) ->
 1254:     megaco_tcp:send_message(Handle, Message),
 1255:     {ok, State}.
 1256: 
 1257: client_await_message(State, ExpectMessage, Timeout) 
 1258:   when is_map(State) ->
 1259:     receive
 1260: 	{receive_message, {_, _, ExpectMessage}} ->
 1261: 	    {ok, State};
 1262: 
 1263: 	Any ->
 1264: 	    p("received unexpected event: ~p", [Any]),
 1265: 	    {error, {unexpected_event, Any}}
 1266: 
 1267:     after Timeout ->
 1268: 	    {error, timeout}
 1269:     end.
 1270: 
 1271: client_block(#{handle := Handle} = State) 
 1272:   when (Handle =/= undefined) ->
 1273:     megaco_tcp:block(Handle),
 1274:     {ok, State}.
 1275: 
 1276: client_unblock(#{handle := Handle} = State) 
 1277:   when (Handle =/= undefined) ->
 1278:     megaco_tcp:unblock(Handle),
 1279:     {ok, State}.
 1280: 
 1281: client_disconnect(#{handle := Handle} = State) 
 1282:   when (Handle =/= undefined) ->
 1283:     megaco_tcp:close(Handle),
 1284:     {ok, State#{handle => undefined, control_pid => undefined}}.
 1285: 
 1286: client_stop_transport(#{transport_ref := Ref} = State) 
 1287:   when (Ref =/= undefined) ->
 1288:     megaco_tcp:stop_transport(Ref),
 1289:     {ok, State}.
 1290: 
 1291:     
 1292: %% -------- Command handler ---------
 1293: 
 1294: start_command_handler(Node, Commands, State, ShortName) ->
 1295:     ?CH:start(Node, Commands, State, ShortName).
 1296: 		  
 1297: await_command_handler_completion(Pids, Timeout) ->
 1298:     ?CH:await_completion(Pids, Timeout).
 1299: 
 1300: 
 1301: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1302: 
 1303: try_tc(TCName, Pre, Case, Post) ->
 1304:     try_tc(TCName, "TEST", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Pre, Case, Post).
 1305: 
 1306: try_tc(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post) ->
 1307:     ?TRY_TC(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post).
 1308: 
 1309: 
 1310: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1311: 
 1312: %% ------- Misc functions --------
 1313: 
 1314: make_node_name(Name) ->
 1315:     case string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()), [$@]) of
 1316:         [_,Host] ->
 1317:             list_to_atom(lists:concat([atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@" ++ Host]));
 1318:         _ ->
 1319:             exit("Test node must be started with '-sname'")
 1320:     end.
 1321: 
 1322: 
 1323: p(F) ->
 1324:     p(F, []).
 1325: 
 1326: p(F, A) ->
 1327:     p(get(sname), F, A).
 1328: 
 1329: p(S, F, A) when is_list(S) ->
 1330:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p ~s ***" 
 1331: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
 1332: 	      [?FTS(), self(), S | A]);
 1333: p(_S, F, A) ->
 1334:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p *** "
 1335: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
 1336: 	      [?FTS(), self() | A]).
 1337: 
 1338:
